column5: Ole Marv and I were down in the woods about 6:00 this morning for our daily hike when I spotted what appeared to be the outline of an owl in the darkness sitting on a tree limb just above the ground.  I approached very slowly and shone my flashlight on it an sure enuff it was an owl staring back at me. I kept inching towards it and got within 8' where I stopped. We just sorta stared at each other for about 30 seconds before he took off.  I couldn't believe I was able to get so close to him.  I didn't have my camera with me, but what an incredible way to start my day  I Googled owls and came up with this, and I'm pretty sure this is a picture of what I saw, and it's also about how close I was to him.  Beautiful !!
Looks like a Great Horned Owl to me, we have them here and they get huge!  Owls are very cool birds of prey!
I use to see those in newmarket around where i use to live.  Preatty neat looking.
Majestic birds for sure Lew. Glad you got a nice close look. Ummmm, you might want to consider holding ol' Marv in your arms  when you near those critters.
That would be something to see for sure Lew.  Take your camera with you next time.  I bet he lives nearby.  Joey
